10     def get_auth_token(self, client, username='admin', password='admin123'):
11         """Helper method to get auth token."""
12         response = client.post('/api/v1/auth/login',
13             json={'username': username, 'password': password},
14             headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
15         )
16         if response.status_code == 200:
17             data = json.loads(response.data)
18             if 'data' in data and 'access_token' in data['data']:
19                 return data['data']['access_token']
20             else:
21                 raise KeyError(f"'access_token' not found in login response: {data}")
22         else:
23             raise RuntimeError(f"Login failed: {response.status_code} {response.data}")
